press_toggle_button.description: Press the toggle button to turn the lamp on or off.

clean_toggle_button.description: Clean the toggle button to ensure it functions properly.

press_button.description: Press the toggle button to turn on/off the lamp.

rotate_bar_clockwise.description: Rotate the lamp's bar clockwise to adjust it.

rotate_bar_anticlockwise.description: Rotate the lamp's bar anti-clockwise to adjust it.

rotate_bar.description: Turn the rotation bar to adjust the position of the lamp's head.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp's base to keep it dust-free.

adjut_head.description: Adjust the head of the lamp in the required direction.

clean_head.description: Clean the head of the lamp to keep it dust-free.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the lamp's head to adjust the light direction.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the base, toggle button, rotation bar and head.

clean_head.description: Clean the lamp head to ensure clear light emission.

clean_toggle_button.description: Wipe the toggle button to keep it clear of dust and dirt.

clean_rotation_bar.description: Clean the rotation bar to maintain its smooth function and prevent it from sticking due to dirt buildup.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp base to keep it dust-free.
